ComicInfo.Summary:
Dream Police Joe Friday and Katie Black have abandoned their posts and fought their way clear across the Dreamscape to find out the truth about Joe's missing partner, Frank Stafford. They have at last met up with Frank, but will any of them survive the secret he has brought from the waking world?
Who are the Dream Police, where did they come from, and why do they want to stop Frank from telling Joe the truth?
MAJOR PLOT POINT
Missing partner Frank Stafford returns and reveals a world shattering secret from the waking world!
ComicInfo.Tags: Katie Black,Joe Thursday,The Architects,Hugh Ross,Dream Police,Frank Stafford,Dreamscape
